ref: 12107 vḗdi f. ʻ raised piece of ground serving as an altar and usu. strewed with kuśa grass ʼ RV., ʻ stand, bench ʼ MBh., ʻ platform for wedding ceremony ʼ Kāv., vēdika<-> m. ʻ bench ʼ R., ˚kā -- f. MBh. [Cf. vēdá -- m. ʻ bunch of kuśa grass used as broom ʼ AV.]
Pa. vēdi -- , ˚dī -- , ˚dikā -- f. ʻ cornice, ledge, rail ʼ;
A. bei ʻ quadrangular frame of greenery forming platform on which ceremonial bathing of bride and bridegroom is performed ʼ.
